params.select: SELECT CAST(fuelId AS CHAR(25)) fuelId, fuelName FROM fuel UNION SELECT ' SELECT fuelId FROM fuel ' fuelId, '- все виды ГСМ -' ORDER BY fuelName

SELECT CAST(groupAccId AS CHAR(34)) groupAccId, groupAccCode +' : '+ groupAccName groupAccName FROM vf_groupAcc UNION SELECT ' SELECT groupAccId FROM vf_groupAcc ' groupAccId, '- все группы -' groupAccName ORDER BY groupAccName

provider.selectSQL: SELECT s.sheetNumber, CONVERT(CHAR(10), s.refuellingDate, 104) rdate, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, CASE s.sheetState WHEN 1 THEN 'закрыта' ELSE ' ' END sheetState, sum(quantity) quantity, pageCount = ( CEILING(CAST((SELECT count(*) FROM VehicleRefuelling o1 WHERE o1.sheetNumber = s.sheetNumber) AS DECIMAL)/CAST(8 AS DECIMAL)) ) FROM waybillsRefuellingSheets s INNER JOIN VehicleRefuelling r ON s.sheetNumber=r.sheetNumber AND s.fuelId=r.fuelId LEFT JOIN vf_groupAcc g ON g.groupAccId = s.groupAccId LEFT JOIN fuel f ON f.fuelId = s.fuelId WHERE s.fuelId IN ({_fuel}) AND s.groupAccId IN ({_group}) GROUP BY s.sheetNumber, s.refuellingDate, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, s.sheetState ORDER BY s.sheetNumber DESC
